last_episode_to_air.name: Marcus' Story
last_episode_to_air.overview: A successful tech entrepreneur finds himself on trial after creating facial recognition software that leads to devastating consequences.

name: Accused

next_episode_to_air.name: Justin’s Story
next_episode_to_air.overview: A wrestling coach is on trial after pushing his star athlete too far.

overview: In this crime anthology series, viewers discover how an ordinary person got caught up in an extraordinary situation, ultimately revealing how one wrong turn leads to another, until it’s too late to turn back. Told from the defendant’s point of view, each episode opens in a courtroom on the accused without knowing their crime or how they ended up on trial.
tagline: Every week a new crime through the eyes of the...

episodes.name: Scott's Story
episodes.overview: A father confronts the limits of unconditional love when he comes to believe his teenage son may be planning an unimaginable crime.

episodes.name: Ava's Story
episodes.overview: After a married couple discovers their newborn is Deaf, they elect to try a surgical procedure. But when their surrogate - who also happens to be Deaf - learns the news, she feels she has no choice but to intervene.

episodes.name: Danny's Story
episodes.overview: After the death of his ailing mother, a teenager suspects foul play when he discovers his mother's former hospice caretaker is now dating his father.

episodes.name: Kendall's Story
episodes.overview: When a man learns his daughter was assaulted, his friends encourage him to take justice into his own hands.

episodes.name: Robyn's Story
episodes.overview: As a man, Kevin is shy and mild-mannered; onstage, she's Robyn Banks, a fierce drag queen who's all confidence and charisma. But when Kevin falls for a closeted guy secretly living a double life, their whirlwind affair leads to devastating consequences.

episodes.name: Naataanii's Story
episodes.overview: After a group of Navajo friends are arrested for protesting the local Uranium mine, they come up with a plan to try and shut it down for good.

episodes.name: Brenda's Story
episodes.overview: When an acerbic female stand-up comic is assaulted by a fellow comic, she uses her platform to try the case in the court of public opinion.

episodes.name: Laura's Story
episodes.overview: A grieving mother learns that facts and evidence are no match for viral misinformation, when she discovers a growing online conspiracy.

episodes.name: Jack's Story
episodes.overview: A high school teacher puts his reputation in jeopardy when he helps a student in need.

episodes.name: Esme's Story
episodes.overview: After a white nationalist plows his car into a peaceful demonstration and gets away, a survivor takes justice into her own hands.

episodes.name: Jiro's Story
episodes.overview: Jiro's mother has taken care of his brother Sam ever since the car accident that left Sam with a traumatic brain injury. But when their mother dies, and it appears that Sam is being abused in his new group home, Jiro has to decide which is more important - his brother, or his freedom.

episodes.name: Morgan's Story
episodes.overview: A teacher going through a messy divorce gets arrested under suspicious circumstances.

episodes.name: Samir's Story
episodes.overview: A limo driver's infatuation with one of his riders leads him down a dark path.

episodes.name: Jessie's Story
episodes.overview: When all her attempts to discover the identity of her biological father hit roadblocks, a teenager takes extreme measures to uncover the truth.

episodes.name: Billy's Story
episodes.overview: An aging rockstar attempts to cement his musical legacy, while trying to prevent his troubled son from unraveling.

episodes.name: Lorraine's Story
episodes.overview: A psychic medium attempts to help a couple desperately looking for their missing son.

episodes.name: April's Story
episodes.overview: A nurse who let her anger get the best of her is put on trial after a road rage incident.

episodes.name: Marcus' Story
episodes.overview: A successful tech entrepreneur finds himself on trial after creating facial recognition software that leads to devastating consequences.

episodes.name: Justin’s Story
episodes.overview: A wrestling coach is on trial after pushing his star athlete too far.
